name: Soma Lab
headline: Conversations with AI patients to scale healthcare training.
description: Soma Lab creates simulated conversations with AI patients to scale healthcare training. Students and providers practice with AI patients to build skills and get evaluated.

founders.name: Vrishank Saini, Founder
founders.description: Vrishank Saini is a University of Chicago neuroscience undergrad with a knack for blending neuroscience and computer science to drive innovation in medical education. As the founder of Bioscope Wellness and Soma Lab, he's not just studying cross-disciplinary subjects—he's applying them, evidenced by his development of a mental health app that garnered national coverage and over 120,000 downloads.

founders.name: Tiko Bdoyan, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Soma Lab passionate about educational technology and the future of learning. Previously, I was a Machine Learning researcher and a varsity wrestler at the University of Chicago.

generated_description:
**Soma Lab: Revolutionizing Healthcare Training through AI Conversations**

Soma Lab is a budding startup founded in 2024, currently making waves as part of Y Combinator's Batch S24. Their mission is straightforward yet impactful: to facilitate healthcare training through simulated conversations with AI patients. This approach allows students and healthcare providers to practice their counseling skills in an environment that mimics real-life interactions.

The innovative platform enables users to engage in full conversations with lifelike AI clients, providing a unique blend of learning and immediate feedback. Whether you're a student honing your skills or a healthcare professional seeking to enhance your interactions, Soma Lab offers a practical, scalable way to elevate your training experience.

Though it started with a small team of just two employees, the ambition is expansive. Under the guidance of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne, Soma Lab is working in a space tagged with keywords such as 'ai-enhanced-learning', 'education', and 'healthcare', underscoring its commitment to improving educational outcomes in the medical field.

Curious about the platform? You can dive into their features or watch a demo by visiting their website at [somalab.ai](https://somalab.ai). The site also offers options to book a demo or get started, making it easy for interested parties to explore how AI can reshape clinical training.

In a nutshell, Soma Lab is at the intersection of AI, healthcare, and education, proving that when you enhance learning through technology, you’re not just preparing for the future; you’re actively creating it.
